responseText: Sure, I can help with that. Crates are how we move larger quantities of resources. Guild Commodities, and Hunting Lodge Commodities are the two most common types, but you may also pack your own resources into Crates to move more than will fit in your bags. All cargo goes into Packed Crates, which can only be moved using Caravans.
name: Caravan_Master_Dialog_50_Response
